original_title: The Smashing Pumpkins: Live In Tokyo
overview: Recorded live at the Nippon Budokan, Tokyo, June 30, 2000. Tracks: Glass And The Ghost Children - The Everlasting Gaze - Heavy Metal Machine - Blew Away - Stand Inside Your Love - Cherub Rock - I Of The Mourning - To Sheila - This Time - Ava Adore - Try, Try, Try - Rock On - Bullet with Butterfly Wings - Today - Fuck You (An Ode To No One) - Blank Page - Mayonaise -1979
title: The Smashing Pumpkins: Live In Tokyo
